name: Doors (itch) (Ilias Woithe)
description:
Ever pushed a pull door or vice versa? I have. A lot.

How To Play

Press play. Click on either push or pull. Get the highest score you can. Not much else to it.

Credits

  • "Chest Slam" by TNTdude7
  • "Wooden chair, push in, pull out" by SpliceSound, edited to use one sound only
  • "m5x7" by Daniel Linssen
